Code Standards

The purpose of the code standards is to ensure that all digital content is developed to the highest standard, using best practice techniques for Page Speed, Accessibility, and Search Engine Optimisation.

The code standards will continually evolve as we keep up to date with the latest best practice methods and advances in web technology.
